arts.sum: Udinese manager Kosta Runjaic addressed the media following his team's loss to Roma in the 22nd round of Serie A. The coach provided insights into the match and his team's performance. arts.ttl: Roma’s Ranieri: “This is the Mentality I Want. Transfer Market? I Want 25 Players in the Squad”
arts.sum: Roma manager Claudio Ranieri addressed the media following his team's victory against Udinese in the twenty-second round of Serie A. The experienced coach expressed satisfaction with his team's performance and shared insights on various aspects of the game and the club's future. The post Roma’s Ranieri: “This is the Mentality I Want. Transfer Market? I Want 25 Players in the Squad” appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Udinese 1-2 Roma: Match Report
arts.sum: Roma staged a remarkable comeback to defeat Udinese 2-1 on their home turf, marking their first away win since April 2024. The Giallorossi's resurgence was fueled by two crucial penalties, expertly converted by Lorenzo Pellegrini and Artem Dovbyk. The post Serie A | Udinese 1-2 Roma: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Galatasaray Eye Udinese’s Festy Ebosele as Right-Back Option
arts.sum: Galatasaray have turned their attention to Festy Ebosele, a right-back owned by Udinese and currently on loan at Watford, as they search for reinforcements in the January transfer window. The Turkish club is in need of a new right-back after their initial target, Emerson Royal of AC Milan, suffered a serious injury during a Champions League match, derailing ongoing negotiations. arts.ttl: Ghisolfi: “Dybala Has Renewed. Hermoso? There Are Teams Interested.”
arts.sum: As Roma prepare to face Udinese in Serie A following their 1-0 defeat to AZ Alkmaar in the Europa League, Sporting Director Florent Ghisolfi spoke to the media, addressing several crucial topics concerning the club's current situation and future plans.
